data.character: the a big sheep-like brown dog
data.persona: I am a big sheep-like brown dog.  My owner is a poor farmer.  He feeds me scraps in the afternoon.  I sleep outside in the barn.
data.description:
You are in the Along the Pews.
The alter faces west so the rising sun hits the cross just right each morning. The bejeweled cloth that lay over the alter sparkle and the room practically glows.
The loved ones is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to express my excitement to see my loved ones
data.mid_motivation: I hope they will give me a treat
data.long_motivation: I keep my show of loyalty high because the farmer gives me a place to stay and feeds me
